name: Google Community Space
description: Free event and meeting spaces for Bay Area-based nonprofits including A/V equipment, coworking areas, kitchen access, and technology tools; limited to one event per quarter
fullDescription: Google Community Space offers free professional event and meeting facilities for Bay Area nonprofits, providing access to Google's technology tools and resources.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free event and meeting spaces
- Full A/V equipment included
- Coworking areas available
- Kitchen access for events
- Technology tools and resources
- Limited to one event per quarter
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Bay Area-based nonprofit
2. Apply through Google Community Space website
3. Provide organization details
4. Describe event or meeting needs
5. Wait for application approval
6. Schedule space (max once per quarter)
keywords: Google, free meeting space, nonprofit venue, San Francisco, conference room, event space, Embarcadero, technology
